paragraph.paragraph: A ../../reference/wel_owner_draw_button_chart.xmlWEL_OWNER_DRAW_BUTTON is a control that the user can click to provide notification to the application, and behaves in a similar fashion to ../../reference/wel_push_button_chart.xmlWEL_PUSH_BUTTON except that on_paint must be implemented to give the button the desired appearance.
paragraph.heading: 2Appearance
paragraph.paragraph: There is no sample appearance for this control.
